description.narrative:
Launch Tech Company Limited (Launch Tech or the Company) is a Chinese firm that designs and manufactures tools and equipment used in the automotive aftermarket sector. Its product line includes automotive diagnostic equipment, lifts, wheel aligners and balancers, tire changers and other products such as emission testing equipment and hand tools. The Company was founded in 1992 by Messrs. LIU Xin and LIU Jun and is today the leading manufacturer of automotive diagnostic equipment in China. Launch Tech was listed on the Hong Kong GEM board in October 2002.
The project consists of Launch Techs capital investment program to (i) consolidate its various Shenzhen-based production and facilities into a single new complex; (ii) expand the operations of its lift equipment manufacturing facility in Shanghai; and (iii) purchase new manufacturing equipment, (the Project). By implementing the Project, the Company aims to: (i) integrate Launch Techs manufacturing, administrative and R&D facilities into one location in Shenzhen; (ii) increase the Companys manufacturing and R&D capacity; and (iii) reduce costs. Bringing together the existing facilities will allow Launch Tech to maintain its competitive advantage, better cater to market demand, provide additional R&D and manufacturing capacity and execute on its growth strategy.

name.narrative: At present, Launch has three rented offices and four separate leased manufacturing facilities spread around Shenzhen. After the implementation of the Project, it aims to consolidate its Shenzhen based operations into one complex in the Shenzhen Longgang Ban Xue Gang High-Tech Park, which will house its administrative, manufacturing and R&D facilities. Launch Techs lift manufacturing facility is located in the Shanghai International Automobile City Spare Parts Assembly Industrial Zone in Anting Town outside of Shanghai.
